remarks: Show that the support of a function is contained in a set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
statement:
suppss.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
suppss.n $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A \ W ) ) -> ( F ` k ) = Z ) $.
suppss $p |- ( ph -> ( F supp Z ) C_ W ) $.
$d F k $.
$d W k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
